name: revanced-links
description: A library to fetch latest ReVanced essentials and scrape app packages supported by ReVanced from APKMirror

scripts.start:nc: nodemon --exec "npm run build:nc && node ./dist/" --watch . --ext ts,json --ignore dist/*
scripts.start: nodemon --exec "npm run build && node ./dist/" --watch . --ext ts,json --ignore dist/*
scripts.build: npm run cleanup && npm run build:nc
scripts.build:nc: npm run compile:nc && npm run docs:nc
scripts.compile: npm run cleanup && npm run compile:nc
scripts.docs: npm run cleanup && npm run docs:nc

author: PalmDevs
